Name: Black blood
About the game: Artificial intelligence has taken over an entire planet. Synthetic robots destroy all living things. Your task is to break through the ranks of the armed aggressor and protect the beacons that transmit a signal for help. This will help you with the drone assistant, which was Autonomous and remained on your side. It can attack, heal You, and repair buildings if you buy the appropriate improvements. You have five types of weapons that can be improved. For improvements, you need to pick up from the defeated enemies of the energy particles. This will help you drone assistant. Also, towers that will attack enemies will help you hold out. The main thing to remember is that towers also cost a certain amount of resources that can be spent on new weapons or improvements. Protect 4 beacons to report danger to the entire galaxy. The fate of the world is in your hands! Features: -4 tasks for building protection - Weapon improvements - Construction of towers - Assistant drone
